name: Idle Hospital
description:
Do you want to cure all the patients in the world? Do you want to be super rich from running your hospital?

You are the director of your own hospital now! Develop a first-class hospital, treat all kinds of weird diseases, manage your own staff, and make your hospital the most visited and famous all over the world!

Treat patients to earn enough money and unlock new departments. This hospital has medicine, surgery, gynecology, pediatrics, psychiatry, and more departments. You can upgrade the department to improve the medical services quality and attract more patients.

Upgrade the pharmacies to increase the capacity to deliver more and more drugs.

Become the best hospital manager, manage your doctors and nurses, utilize their skills to cure patients better and faster, ultimately bring you higher profits. Hire more distributors to deliver drugs to the hospital in time.

Come and enjoy if you like idle game!

Features:
- Casual and easy to operate
- Automated processes without waiting
- Weird and funny departments
- Cute employees, and each with special skills
- No need wifi, earn money when you are offline

Become the greatest hospital tycoon！
